mapper.sql: id, pn, vin, device_code, device_item, sn, config_word, supplier_code, batch_num, hardware_ver, software_ver, hardware_pn, software_pn, extra, bind_time, bind_type, bind_by, bind_org, unbind_time, unbind_reason, unbind_by, unbind_org, part_state, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_vehicle_part_history ( id, pn, vin, device_code, device_item, sn, config_word, supplier_code, batch_num, hardware_ver, software_ver, hardware_pn, software_pn, extra, bind_time, bind_type, bind_by, bind_org, unbind_time, unbind_reason, unbind_by, unbind_org, part_state, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pn}, #{vin}, #{deviceCode}, #{deviceItem}, #{sn}, #{configWord}, #{supplierCode}, #{batchNum}, #{hardwareVer}, #{softwareVer}, #{hardwarePn}, #{softwarePn}, #{extra}, #{bindTime}, #{bindType}, #{bindBy}, #{bindOrg}, #{unbindTime}, #{unbindReason}, #{unbindBy}, #{unbindOrg}, #{partState}, #{description}, now(), #{createBy}, now(), #{modifyBy}, 1, 1 )

INSERT INTO tb_vehicle_part_history ( id, pn, vin, device_code, device_item, sn, config_word, supplier_code, batch_num, hardware_ver, software_ver, hardware_pn, software_pn, extra, bind_time, bind_type, bind_by, bind_org, unbind_time, unbind_reason, unbind_by, unbind_org, part_state, description, create_time, create_by, modify_time, modify_by, row_version, row_valid ) VALUES
( #{item.id}, #{item.pn}, #{item.vin}, #{item.deviceCode}, #{item.deviceItem}, #{item.sn}, #{item.configWord}, #{item.supplierCode}, #{item.batchNum}, #{item.hardwareVer}, #{item.softwareVer}, #{item.hardwarePn}, #{item.softwarePn}, #{item.extra}, #{item.bindTime}, #{item.bindType}, #{item.bindBy}, #{item.bindOrg}, #{item.unbindTime}, #{item.unbindReason}, #{item.unbindBy}, #{item.unbindOrg}, #{item.partState}, #{item.description}, now(), #{item.createBy}, now(), #{item.modifyBy}, 1, 1 )
mapper.update:
UPDATE tb_vehicle_part_history t SET
t.pn = #{pn},
t.vin = #{vin},
t.device_code = #{deviceCode},
t.device_item = #{deviceItem},
t.sn = #{sn},
t.config_word = #{configWord},
t.supplier_code = #{supplierCode},
t.batch_num = #{batchNum},
t.hardware_ver = #{hardwareVer},
t.software_ver = #{softwareVer},
t.hardware_pn = #{hardwarePn},
t.software_pn = #{softwarePn},
t.extra = #{extra},
t.bind_time = #{bindTime},
t.bind_type = #{bindType},
t.bind_by = #{bindBy},
t.bind_org = #{bindOrg},
t.unbind_time = #{unbindTime},
t.unbind_reason = #{unbindReason},
t.unbind_by = #{unbindBy},
t.unbind_org = #{unbindOrg},
t.part_state = #{partState},
t.description = #{description},
t.modify_by = #{modifyBy},
t.row_version = t.row_version + 1, t.modify_time = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_vehicle_part_history t SET t.row_version = t.row_version + 1, t.modify_time = now(), t.row_valid = 0 WHERE t.id = #{value}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_vehicle_part_history t WHERE t.id = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_vehicle_part_history t WHERE t.id = #{value} AND t.row_valid = 1

SELECT FROM tb_vehicle_part_history t WHERE t.row_valid = 1
ORDER BY t.id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_vehicle_part_history t WHERE t.row_valid = 1
